name: market for polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled | polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/16473/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled', in the geography of Europe without Switzerland. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;'polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled', is a plastic product of fossil origin, it is not biodegradable and it is a thermoplastic material. This product consists of 100% recycled material. The product is used in the following applications and sectors: piping, plastic lumber, recycling bins, toys, and rope.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled',  within the geography of Europe without Switzerland.

This activity ends with the supply of 'polyethylene, high density, granulate, recycled',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Regional market created to enable that the recycled material is made available to regional transforming activities in the same geography.
